sentences.sentence: Hark ye--come no more till thou do bring his head.
sentences.translation: 你们听着——不把他的头拿来，就不要进宫来。

sentences.sentence: Hark you, my son, try as I will I can get nothing into your head.
sentences.translation: 听着，我的孩子，尽管我很努力，但我什么也教不了你。

sentences.sentence: Hark to the plaintive song of the old woman, to the call of the priests!
sentences.translation: 听老妇人哀怨的歌声，听祭师们的召唤吧！
